articles.title: Novel X-ray lens facilitates glimpse into the nanoworld - Nanowerk
articles.description: Scientists have developed a ground-breaking achromatic lens for X-rays. This allows the X-ray beams to be accurately focused on a single point even if they have different wavelengths. The new lens will make it much easier to study nanostructures using X-rays.
